about_the_game:
Overseer is a topdown rogue-like game heavily inspired by Dungeon Souls. This time, you can play with friends and enjoy the intense splashy combat together. The Overseer system allows you to take control of the dungeon and to make it more interesting and challenging: spawning monsters, placing traps, and changing the layout of the dungeon to spice things up.

Overseer's background story is about a mad scientist testing the greatest adventurers of all time. (One of each class), throughout the dungeon, the player will notice hidden wires and the hard light holographic room glitch out.

content_descriptors.notes: Overseer contains cartoon violence, unrealistic depictions of blood (in red pixels or in character's color or for example, green pixel for slime) and unrealistic death.

detailed_description:
Overseer is a topdown rogue-like game heavily inspired by Dungeon Souls. This time, you can play with friends and enjoy the intense splashy combat together. The Overseer system allows you to take control of the dungeon and to make it more interesting and challenging: spawning monsters, placing traps, and changing the layout of the dungeon to spice things up.

Overseer's background story is about a mad scientist testing the greatest adventurers of all time. (One of each class), throughout the dungeon, the player will notice hidden wires and the hard light holographic room glitch out.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Linux distribution
  • Processor: 2.9 GHz
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any Linux distribution
  • Processor: 2.9 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.12
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Sierra 10.13 or higher
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

name: Overseer Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core 64-bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core 64-bit
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 based graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: Overseer is a topdown rogue-like game heavily inspired by Dungeon Souls. Enjoy playing with friends with intense splashy combat. The Overseer system will let you take control of the dungeon where it will spawn in monsters, place traps, and change the dungeon layout to spice things up.
